articles.description: King Charles III boasts a 'relentless schedule' that sees him pull late nights and skip lunch after eating only fruit and seeds for breakfast, a former aide says
articles.content:
Charles never stops for lunch and has a breakfast of fruit and seeds, his former press secretary has revealed. 
Despite rumours that the King is served a line of eggs to choose from every morning, J… [+2604 chars]

articles.title: Frozen Planet II: Human heartlessness takes starring role in new David Attenborough series - The Independent
articles.description: The criminal insanity of the damage we are doing to our planet makes for surreal television
articles.content:
Polar bears, soaring strings and glorious aerial photography can only mean one thing the second series of Frozen Planet is finally here.
